text: The women's single sculls competition at the 2016 Summer Paralympics in Rio de Janeiro will take place are at Rodrigo de Freitas Lagoon. ==Results== The winner of each heat qualify to the finals, remainder goes to the repechage.2016 Paralympic Games — Regatta; World Rowing website; accessed September 2016 ===Heats=== ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" width=50% |- !Rank !Rower !Country
